issue.title: Make the client configuration of aware of `quarkus-proxy-registry`

repository.name: quarkus-cxf
repository.description: Quarkus CXF Extension to support SOAP based web services.

issue.body:
Would it be possible to add simliar settings like `quarkus.cxf.client.tls-configuration-name` and `quarkus.cxf.logging.enabled-for` for proxy settings including no-proxy?

This is just for an easier configuration if the clients connect through the same proxy.

body:
I like this.

> It could work much like it works with quarkus-tls-registry for TLS settings.

This is what I thought of before finishing reading your suggestion :)
I can do this unless anybody else would like to take it?

issue.title: Introduce global HTTP proxy settings configuration

labels.name: area/dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body:
This is how the global HTTP proxy configuration could work. I am open to discuss any aspects of this PR

What is in this PR:
* A new `quarkus-proxy-config` extension
* The reactive REST client was made to use the new global settings

TBD:
* Other extensions supporting HTTP proxy should be made aware of `quarkus-proxy-config`
* ~~Review the new and existing proxy related config docs in `quarkus-rest-client-config`~~
* Revisit https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-client#proxy-support

- Closes: #50512

issue.title: Revisit https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-client#proxy-support after #50709
issue.body: We should revisit https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-client#proxy-support after #50709 (fixing #50512) was merged.
